column4: guys. i am cuztomizing the desktop. can i use gtk & emeral themes are the same time? or are those two mutually exclusive? because i see one theme pack that has a gtk and an emerald theme, don't know what to do
the buttons and text boxes, etc, will be gtk, but the windows borders will be emerald/compiz
so to install the full theme, I need to install both of those correct?
I copied a theme into my /home/.theme but it wont' sho when i go to system --> appearnce
how can I go about doing that? I thought I had upgraded.
this is what i get in the about ubuntu window: Thank you for your interest in Ubuntu 8.10
I did that. Got the same error: W: Failed to fetch http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/dists/edgy/universe/binary-i386/Packages.gz  404 Not Found
will do. Give me a sec to give you the URL.
find all the lines with edgy in them, and put a # in from of them
